Option: general.login_page

This option should contain the login page url, the MCFileManager will redirect the user to this page is he/she isn't authenticated/logged in.

This login page should setup the sessions or similar needed by the authentication logic.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['general.login_page'] = "login.php";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

general.login_page=login.php
